price: Ey insanlar! Allah dilerse sizi yokluğa gönderip başkalarını getirir; Allah buna kadirdir.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَيَأۡتِ بِـَٔاخَرِينَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum ayyuhā al-nāsu wayati biākharīna wakāna al-lahu ʿalā dhālika qadīran
